title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       Harry S Truman NHS has partnered with two important National Park Service initiatives, Teaching with Historic Places (TwHP) and Teaching with Museum Collections, in order to provide educators with cirriculum materials related to President Truman, his life and his times.
